tips.text:
Stack two wooden slabs on top of each other to unlock a neat alternative pattern!
Unless you disabled the Carpentry Blocks Resource Pack.
In which case... don't?
Craft a Painting with 8 Paper and a Dye and enjoy the luxury of having a painting of your cool and awesome fursona in your house!
The practice of a baker's dozen (13 items) originated in medieval England (13th century) as a way for bakers to have a delectable little snacky.

? In English, it's pronounced "Paris" but everyone else pronounces it without the "s" sound, like the French do. But with
, everyone pronouces it the English way: "Venice". Like 'The Merchant of Venice' or 'Death in Venice'.
WHY, THOUGH!? WHY ISN'T THE TITLE DEATH IN VENEZIA!? ARE YOU KIDDING ME!? IT TAKES PLACE IN ITALY, SO USE THE ITALIAN WORD, DAMMIT! THAT PISSES ME OFF! BUNCH OF DUMBASSES!
